question:
Which among the following are directly linked to Vedic Literature:
  1. Dharamasutra
  2. Acaranga Sutra
  3. Avatamsaka Sutra
Choose the correct option:
explanation: Dharmasūtra is a class of Sanskrit prose texts concerned with law and rules of conduct. It is related to Vedic literature. Avtamasaka sutra is related to Buddhism.It is one of the most influential Mahāyāna sutras of East Asian Buddhism.
